scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run bundle && npm run copy-electron && npm run copy-browser
scripts.copy-browser: cp src/*.png src/help.html public && cp src/browser.html public/index.html
scripts.bundle: rollup --config rollup-browser-renderer.config.js && rollup --config rollup-browser-server.config.js && rollup --config rollup-electron-main.config.js && rollup --config rollup-electron-renderer.config.js
